attributes.action: make a law that means all new build houses are build with solar panels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If all new build homes are build with solar panels by law, it is bound to be a step in the right direction. It will generate enough power to make a difference. It will also help increase technology in this field, and lower existing costs so older properties will see the viability of this option.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
